casebody.data:
[L. A. No. 19916. In Bank. Sept. 15, 1948.] STELLA MERRIWEATHER et al., Respondents, v. W. T. FLEMING et al., Appellants. STELLA MERRIWEATHER et al., Respondents, v. ROSCOE LOOPER et al., Appellants. Loren Miller and Harold J. Sinclair for Appellants. John F. Poole for Respondents.

(Two Cases)
